Planning meals around sales and using what you already have at home is a great way to save money and reduce food waste. And who can resist a classic spaghetti Bolognese?

Finding more coupons and discounts for your favorite brands can be a great way to save even more. Here are some suggestions:

1. **Sign up for newsletters**: Register for newsletters from your favorite brands or grocery stores to receive exclusive coupons, promotions, and sales notifications.
2. **Follow social media**: Follow your favorite brands on social media platforms like Facebook, Twitter, or Instagram to stay informed about promotions, giveaways, and special offers.
3. **Check websites and apps**: Regularly visit the websites of your favorite brands or grocery stores to look for digital coupons, promo codes, or sales. You can also use apps like RetailMeNot, Coupons.com, or Honey to find discounts and coupons.
4. **Look for peelies and stickers**: Check packaging for peelies or stickers with coupons or promo codes. These can be a great way to save on your favorite products.
5. **Cashback apps**: Use cashback apps like Ibotta, Fetch Rewards, or Checkout 51 that offer rebates on certain brands or products.
6. **Manufacturer websites**: Visit the websites of your favorite brands to find coupons, promotions, or special offers. Some brands also offer loyalty programs or rewards that can help you save.
7. **Online coupon databases**: Websites like CouponCabin or SmartSource offer a vast collection of printable coupons and digital coupons that you can use.
8. **In-store promotions**: Keep an eye out for in-store promotions, such as "buy one get one free" deals or "10% off entire purchase" offers.
9. **Digital coupons at checkout**: Some stores offer digital coupons that you can load onto your loyalty card or mobile app. These can be used at checkout to save on your favorite products.
10. **Ask friends and family**: Share your favorite brands with friends and family and ask them to keep an eye out for coupons or discounts. You can also swap coupons or share tips with each other.

By using these methods, you can find more coupons and discounts for your favorite brands and save even more on your grocery shopping.
